headline.main: Turkey Suspends 12,800 Police Officers as Crackdown Continues

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject

snippet: A day after extending a state of emergency, the Turkish government accused the officers of being linked to the network behind a failed coup in July....
lead_paragraph: A day after extending a state of emergency, the Turkish government accused the officers of being linked to the network behind a failed coup in July.
